meta.name: The Voice
meta.description: The Voice is a singing competition where famous musicians serve as coaches to mentor aspiring artists through a series of blind auditions, battles, and live performances, with the ultimate goal of finding and crowning America's best new vocal talent.

videos.title: Live Finale Top 6 Performances
videos.overview: The top six artists perform a contemporary and classic song in front of the coaches to compete for the title of "The Voice"; viewers have the chance to vote for their favorite artist overnight.

videos.title: Live Finale Preshow
videos.overview: The top six artists perform a contemporary and classic song to compete for the title of "The Voice."

videos.title: Live Finale Results
videos.overview: Host Carson Daly reveals who America has chosen to be the Season 28 winner; the finale includes special performances by superstar artists that include Khalid and XG; plus, the finalists perform holiday duets with their coaches.

videos.title: The Playoffs Part 2
videos.overview: The remaining artists compete to make it to the live finale; tough decisions are made when coaches Niall Horan and Snoop Dogg can only advance one artist each, but America can vote through two additional wildcard artists into the finale.

videos.title: Blind Auditions (1)
videos.overview: In the series premiere of this new vocal competition series, "blind auditions" are held in front of a celebrity panel of music coaches including, Christina Aguilera, Cee Lo Green, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton who each compete to select eight vocalists for their individual teams. Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts the premiere, which features an array of hopeful vocalists as they fight for a chance to win the grand prize of a recording contract and $100,000.

videos.title: Blind Auditions (2)
videos.overview: Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts week two of this vocal competition series, which features a colorful array of talented vocalists as they compete to prove to the coaches that they deserve to make it into their top eight. Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Cee Lo Green and Blake Shelton determine which vocalists advance to the battle rounds.

videos.title: The Battles (1)
videos.overview: In the first installment of the "battle rounds" the coaches join forces with music industry professionals for guidance. Christina Aguilera teams up with singer/songwriter Sia Furler, Adam Levine with music producer Adam Blackstone, Cee Lo Green with singer Monica, and Blake Shelton with Grammy-winning singer Reba. In this phase the coaches will pit two of their own team members against each other in a dueling duet. After the vocal face-off, each coach, with the help of their adviser, must choose which of his/her singers are the strongest and advance them to the live shows. Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts.

videos.title: The Battles (2)
videos.overview: The "battle rounds" continue and the coaches join forces with music industry professionals for guidance. Christina Aguilera teams up with singer/songwriter Sia Furler, Adam Levine with music producer Adam Blackstone, Cee Lo Green with singer Monica, and Blake Shelton with Grammy-winning singer Reba. In this phase the coaches will pit two of their own team members against each other in a dueling duet. After the vocal face-off, each coach, with the help of their adviser, must choose which of his/her singers are the strongest and four vocalists will advance to the live shows. Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts.

videos.title: Live Show, Quarter-Finals (1)
videos.overview: In this live performance phase of the competition, the top vocalists from each team will compete against each other during a live broadcast. America will vote to save one vocalist on each team, leaving coaches Christina Aguilera, Cee Lo Green, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton to decide during the live show who they will save and who will not move on. Finally, each coach will have their best vocalist left standing to compete in the finale for the chance to win the grand prize of a $100,000 and a recording contract. Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts.

videos.title: Live Show, Quarter-Finals (2)

videos.title: The Semi-Finals
videos.overview: In the semi-finals phase of the competition, the final two members of coaches Christina Aguilera, Cee Lo Green, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton teams perform during a live broadcast. Only one of them will move forward and represent their coach in the finale for the chance to win the grand prize of a $100,000 and a recording contract. Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts.

videos.title: The Finals
videos.overview: In the final phase of the competition, the remaining four members of coaches Christina Aguilera, Cee Lo Green, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton's teams perform during a live broadcast. One of them will be a step closer to winning the grand prize of a $100,000 and a Universal Republic recording contract. Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts.

videos.title: Results Show
videos.overview: It's the season finale of "The Voice" where host Carson Daly will reveal who America has chosen to be the winner of the grand prize of a $100,000 and a Universal Republic recording contract. Christina Aguilera, Cee Lo Green, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton, star as the celebrity panel of coaches.

videos.title: The Blind Auditions (1)
videos.overview: In the season two premiere, the "blind auditions" are held in front of the celebrity panel of coaches including, Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Cee Lo Green and Blake Shelton, who each hand pick 12 vocalists for their individual teams. The strongest vocalists from across the country compete to be selected by one of the coaches and fight for a chance to win the title of being named "The Voice." Christina Milian ("Be Cool") joins as Social Media Correspondent and Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts.

Coaches Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Cee Lo Green and Blake Shelton continue building their teams. Christina Milian ("Be Cool") serves as Social Media Correspondent.

In this phase the coaches pit two of their own team members against each other in a dueling duet. After the vocal face-off, each coach must choose which vocalist from their team is the strongest and advance them to the live shows. Carson Daly ("Last Call with Carson Daly") hosts. Christina Milian ("Be Cool") serves as Social Media Correspondent.

videos.title: The Live Playoffs, Night 1
videos.overview: The LIVE performances kick off with the artists on Team Christina and Team Blake each vying for a spot in the Top 12. Blake and Christina unveil their coach comebacks.

videos.overview: The epic LIVE performances continue as the artists on Team Adam and Team Pharrell try to win their way into the Top 12. Adam and Pharrell each unveil their coach comeback.

videos.overview: The top 11 artists perform live in front of coaches Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Pharrell Williams for America's vote. Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.title: Live Top 11 Eliminations
videos.overview: Nine artists will be revealed as safe by America's votes. The bottom two artists will then compete for the Instant Save and one will be eliminated. Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Pharrell Williams star as the celebrity panel of coaches and Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts. ACM winner Thomas Rhett will take the stage to perform, for the first time, his latest Top 15 single "T-Shirt" off his sophomore album "Tangled Up".

videos.title: Live Top 10 Performances
videos.overview: The top ten artists perform live in front of coaches Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Pharrell Williams for America's votes. Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.title: Live Top 10 Eliminations
videos.overview: Eight artists will be revealed as safe by America's votes. The bottom two artists will then compete for the Instant Save and one will be eliminated. Season Eight winner Sawyer Fredericks will perform his single "4 Pockets" and Joe Jonas-led group DNCE will perform a medley of their singles "Cake By the Ocean" and "Toothbrush." Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Pharrell Williams star as the celebrity panel of coaches and Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.title: Live Semi-final Performances
videos.overview: World-renowned recording artist P!nk will serve as superstar advisor for the eight semi-finalists. The top eight artists perform live in front of coaches Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Pharrell Williams for America's votes. Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.title: Live Semi-final Results
videos.overview: America will vote to keep the top three artists in the competition. After these finalists are revealed, the bottom two artists will be sent home immediately, while the middle three artists will compete in the Instant Save for the last spot in the finale. Alicia Keys, who is set to become the new 'Voice' Coach in the Fall, will sing her new single 'In Common,' while OneRepublic will perform "Wherever I Go." Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Pharrell Williams star as the celebrity panel of coaches and Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.overview: It's the season finale of "The Voice," and host Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") will reveal who America has chosen to be the winner. Christina Aguilera, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Pharrell Williams star as the celebrity panel of coaches.

videos.title: Live Top 10 Eliminations
videos.overview: The Top 10 Voice artists have each demonstrated their tremendous singing abilities - but only eight can continue on in the competition. Tonight, find out who makes it to next week's live semi-final rounds.

videos.title: Live Semi-Final Performances
videos.overview: The Top 8 artists perform live in front of coaches Miley Cyrus, Alicia Keys, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton for America's votes. Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.title: Live Semi-Final Results
videos.overview: America will vote to keep the top three artists in the competition. After these finalists are revealed, the bottom two artists will be sent home immediately, while the middle three artists will compete in the Instant Save for the last spot in the finale.

videos.title: Live Finale, Part 1
videos.overview: THE FINAL VOCALISTS COMPETE FOR THE TITLE OF THE VOICE - In the final phase of the competition, the final four artists perform live in front of coaches Miley Cyrus, Alicia Keys, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton. One of the four artists will be a step closer to being named "The Voice." Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.title: Live Finale, Part 2
videos.overview: America's vote reveals who will be named the winner of "The Voice''; performances from Bruno Mars, Sting, The Weeknd, Stevie Wonder and Ariana Grande; Kelly Clarkson, John legend, KISS and Cam perform duets with the final four artists.

videos.title: Blind Auditions Premiere, Night 1
videos.overview: In the season premiere, the competition is fierce, the talent is exceptional and the surprises abound as coaches Alicia Keys, Adam Levine, Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani all vie to discover and coach the next singing phenomenon from the country's best vocalists in the "blind auditions." The vocalists compete to be selected by one of the coaches and fight for a chance to win the title of "The Voice." Carson Daly ("TODAY Show") hosts.

videos.title: Blind Auditions, Part 6
videos.overview: The "blind auditions" conclude as superstar coaches Miley Cyrus, Jennifer Hudson, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton all vie to discover and coach the next singing phenomenon from the country's best vocalists. The vocalists compete for one last chance to be selected by one of the coaches and fight for a chance to win the title of being named "The Voice."

videos.title: The Battles Premiere
videos.overview: Kelly Rowland, Billy Ray Cyrus, Joe Jonas and Rascal Flatts help Coaches Miley, Jennifer, Adam and Blake prepare their artists for the battles, where two artists from the same team duel by duet.

videos.title: The Battles Premiere, Part 2
videos.overview: Two of Jennifer's artists perform a Whitney Houston song; Blake's artists take on a '90s alt-rock hit; Adam's vocalists tackle a current chart-topper.

videos.title: The Battles, Part 3
videos.overview: Tonight, Blake, Jennifer, Miley and Adam each have one steal left, and surprises abound as the battle rounds continue with electrifying performances and debilitating decisions. Miley shocks and breaks with precedent by making a special, and very significant, acquisition to her team. Although Jennifer has a specific vision for what she is looking for with her remaining steal, she finds competition with another coach who also has an eye out.

videos.title: The Battles, Part 4
videos.overview: The battles go out with a bang tonight as Blake's final pairing lights up the stage with an energetic performance of a country anthem, leaving Blake and the other coaches distraught that he is the only one left with a steal. Jennifer surprises her two male R&B artists with an unexpected yet brilliant song choice as their impressive vocal acrobatics literally get Kelly Rowland out of her seat during rehearsal. With Billy Ray declaring it a "full circle moment," Miley's two female country artists are thrilled by her choice to bestow upon them a song of special significance to her family.

videos.title: The Knockouts Premiere
videos.overview: The "knockout rounds" begin with coaches Miley Cyrus, Jenifer Hudson, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton's strongest team members remaining from the battle rounds. The artists will be paired against a teammate once more, but this time they will each select their own song to perform individually, while their direct competitor watches and waits. Incoming Season 14 coach, Grammy Award-winning and music sensation, Kelly Clarkson, will serve as a key adviser and be on hand to work with all of the coaches and their teams as they prepare the artists for this challenge. The coaches alone will choose the winner from their team to move on to the Playoff shows and the artist not selected will be available to be stolen by another coach.

videos.title: The Voice: Best of the Season
videos.overview: Relive the best moments from the season so far during this original jam-packed special chronicling the journey from the blind auditions through the battles from the perspective of coaches Miley Cyrus, Jennifer Hudson, Adam Levine and Blake Shelton as well as their battle advisers, Billy Ray Cyrus, Rascal Flatts, Joe Jonas and Kelly Rowland. Also includes never before seen footage of the coaches, plus incoming Season 14 coach and Season 13 Key Adviser, Kelly Clarkson, joins them for the first ever "Voice Halloween Confessional."

videos.title: The Battles, Part 1
videos.overview: The "Battle Rounds" begin. The artists take the stage for the "Battle Rounds"! The coaches enlist music industry powerhouses Charlie Puth, Kelsea Ballerini, Brooks & Dunn and Khalid to prepare their artists for a dueling duet. After the vocal face-off, each coach must choose which artist from their team is the strongest, and has the option of stealing losing artists from an opposing coach. Each coach has two steals during the "Battle Rounds." Winning artists will proceed to the brand new round, the "LIVE Cross Battles," all in the hopes of being named the next Voice champion.
